newsitem.title: INDIA: Indian sugar prices weaken despite festival season.
newsitem.headline: Indian sugar prices weaken despite festival season.

text.p: Indian sugar prices weakened on Wednesday despite the onset of the festival season, dealers said.
"Consumer demand was low inspite of approaching festivals and increased offerings dragged down prices," one dealer said.
Ready delivery S-30 sugar fell by 3-7 rupees to 1,355/1,388 rupees per quintal and M-30 by five to 1,385/1,420 rupees. Sugar mill delivery eased by five to 1,295/1,305 rupees.
The markets are closed on Thursday for a local festival.
